## Discussion

If no applications are presenting an immersive space, this is the direction of the last recenter.

# SpatialAudioExperiences.AnchoringStrategy.front

**Case**

Anchor to the front of the user’s space.

## Declaration

```swift
case front
```

## Discussion

If no applications are presenting an immersive space, this is the direction of the last recenter.

While in an immersive space, this is the front of that space.
title: SpatialAudioExperiences.AnchoringStrategy.front
